response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product represents not just an investment but a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value and is reflective of my confidence in its unparalleled capabilities.

Please consider this offer carefully. I believe it presents a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at an attractive price. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
